amendment.description: Amendment to change the short title of the bill and make minor technical edits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in in Part A of House Report 111-425 to change the short title of the bill and make minor technical edits.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Miller, George.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
